tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE criminals (
  criminal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  criminal_record TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE criminals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    alias VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR,
    height DECIMAL,
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criminal_id INT,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50),
    crime_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    details TEXT
    FOREIGN KEY (criminal_id) REFERENCES criminals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE criminal_records (
     record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     criminal_id INT,
     crime_type VARCHAR(50),
     crime_date DATE,
     location VARCHAR(100),
     FOREIGN KEY (criminal_id) REFERENCES known_criminals(criminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_logs (
     log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     timestamp TIMESTAMP,
     action VARCHAR(50),
     user_id INT,
     note TEXT,
     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES known_criminals(criminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE criminals (
 criminal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name TEXT,
 last_name TEXT,
 age INT,
 address TEXT,
 criminal_record TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE criminals (
    criminal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR,
    crime_date DATE,
    criminal_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (criminal_id) REFERENCES criminals(criminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sightings (
    sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    sighting_date DATE,
    criminal_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (criminal_id) REFERENCES criminals(criminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE warrants (
    warrant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warrant_details TEXT,
    warranted_by VARCHAR,
    criminal_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (criminal_id) REFERENCES criminals(criminal_id)
);
